title: HELP ME

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I can tplay league anymore please help me. I played yesterday but I cant today... HELP ME PLEASE

replies.body:
Bugsplats are typically the result of poor interactions with your drivers or hardware. I strongly urge you to work through the consolidated list of common solutions in our [bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

Let me know how those steps work for you.

I restarted my computer and that worked for about 3 games. I then took out a File that contained  a new HUD thinking it maybe corrupting things. I updated my graphics driver at the same time and all seems to be well. Thanks for the help!
I can't play anymore either, bugsplat on every mode
